'''Quick As Lightning''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to [[Sprinting|sprint]] continuously (or use an alternative sprint) for over 15s.

==Trivia==
* The original name {{lang|"Run, Melos!"|zh=奔跑吧！梅洛斯}} is a reference to the famous Japanese novel ''{{w|Run, Melos!}}'' by {{w|Osamu Dazai}}.
